title: data model of a platform
description: global description of the data model

providedBy.description: Property. A resolvable link to the participant self-description providing the service.

termsAndConditions.description: Property. A resolvable link to the Terms and Conditions applying to that service.

title.description: Property. Title of the Data Product

description.description: Property. Description of the Data Product

issuedDateTime.description: Property. Publication date in ISO 8601 format

obsoleteDateTime.description: Property. Date time in ISO 8601 format after which data is obsolete.

expirationDateTime.description: Property. Ddate time in ISO 8601 format after which data is expired and shall be deleted.

dataDomains.description: Property. List of Tags or Keywords (Unicode) for data domains

exposedThrough.description: Property. A resolvable link to the data exchange component that exposes the data resource.

policies.description: Property. a list of policy expressed using a DSL (e.g., Rego or ODRL)

dataController.description: Property. Data controller Participant as defined in GDPR.

consent.description: Property. List of consents from the data subjects as Natural Person when the dataset contains PII, as defined by the Trust Framework

copyrightOwnedBy.description: Property. A list of copyright owner either as a free form string or participant self-description.

license.description: Property. A list of URIs to license document.

distribution.description: Property. List of distributions format of the dataset

title.description: Property. Filename of the dataset distribution

byteSize.description: Property. Size of the dataset distribution

location.description: Property. List of dataset storage location
